headline: Role of Boards in Shareholder Activism – LA CorpGov Forum
summary: CorpGov is pleased to provide complete video coverage of the inaugural LA CorpGov Forum held on Sept. 4, 2025, at the Edelman Headquarters in the heart of Hollywood. The forum featured over a hundred institutional investors, corporate executives and USC faculty/alumni in an afternoon of panels, firesides and networking. headline: Hasbro Moves Its Headquarters to Boston
summary: The maker of Nerf blasters and Play-Doh will relocate its headquarters to Boston from Pawtucket, R.I., a move the company said will accelerate innovation, attract top talent and drive long-term growth.

raw.headline: Hasbro Moves Its Headquarters to Boston
raw.summary: The maker of Nerf blasters and Play-Doh will relocate its headquarters to Boston from Pawtucket, R.I., a move the company said will accelerate innovation, attract top talent and drive long-term growth.

headline: A New Era of Play: Hasbro Makes a Move to Boston
summary: PAWTUCKET, R.I., September 08, 2025--Today, Hasbro, Inc., a leading games, IP, and toy company, announced it will relocate its Rhode Island operations to 400 Summer Street in Boston’s Seaport District. This new location will be the primary headquarters for Hasbro’s toys, board games, and licensing businesses, and a majority of its corporate services. This strategic move positions the company to accelerate innovation, attract top talent, and drive long-term growth in line with Hasbro’s Playing to

headline: Hasbro Expands Disney Partnership With Play-Doh Launch Targeting Young Creators
summary: Hasbro Inc. (NASDAQ:HAS) and Disney Consumer Products, Inc., the retailing and licensing subsidiary of the Disney Experiences segment of The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS), announced Monday an expanded collaboration that will bring Disney characters into Hasbro’s iconic PLAY-DOH brand. The new line will launch with a Disney Jr. Mickey Mouse Clubhouse collection aimed at preschool children. headline: 2 Toys & Games Stocks to Watch From a Prospering Industry
summary: The Zacks Toys - Games - Hobbies industry benefits from robust demand for sports toys, fashion dolls and accessories, and STEM toys. Stocks like HAS and MAT are well-positioned to capitalize on these trends.

headline: Hasbro (HAS) Valuation in Focus After Relaunch of EASY-BAKE and PLAYSKOOL with Walmart Exclusivity
summary: Hasbro (HAS) just made headlines with a move bound to get both investors and toy aficionados talking. The company, teaming up with Just Play, has relaunched its legendary EASY-BAKE and PLAYSKOOL brands, offering updated classics and all-new twists crafted for modern families. With exclusive rights granted to Walmart, Hasbro is betting big on nostalgia-driven demand and accessible innovation to re-energize some of its most recognized products. headline: Hasbro and Disney Consumer Products Announce Multi-Year, Multi-Property Collaboration with Disney for PLAY-DOH to Bring Imagination Directly into Kids’ Hands
summary: PAWTUCKET, R.I. & BURBANK, Calif., September 08, 2025--Hasbro, Inc. (NASDAQ: HAS), a leading games, IP and toy company, and Disney Consumer Products today announced a new, expanded collaboration between the PLAY-DOH brand and Disney to champion the power of imagination through immersive sensory play, storytelling, and experiences. The collaboration will feature PLAY-DOH compound-led play systems inspired by the magic of beloved Disney characters and stories.

raw.headline: Hasbro and Disney Consumer Products Announce Multi-Year, Multi-Property Collaboration with Disney for PLAY-DOH to Bring Imagination Directly into Kids’ Hands
raw.summary: PAWTUCKET, R.I. & BURBANK, Calif., September 08, 2025--Hasbro, Inc. (NASDAQ: HAS), a leading games, IP and toy company, and Disney Consumer Products today announced a new, expanded collaboration between the PLAY-DOH brand and Disney to champion the power of imagination through immersive sensory play, storytelling, and experiences. The collaboration will feature PLAY-DOH compound-led play systems inspired by the magic of beloved Disney characters and stories.
